name: Chaos Battle Universe
description:
Chaos Battle Universe is a Smash-Type game that allows you to play out your dream scenario of letting your favorite Characters across all universes murder each other.


Gameplay:

-Select your team as you like, then watch the fight from above and control each character in Real-Time and let the Action unfold.

-With the brand-new physics engine you can even observe your enemies fly across the map.

-With the gold and experience earned from each won battle, you must level-ups and unlock new characters

-Play through the breathtakingly immersive Story and beat all chapters to finally confront the Eternal Being



Key Features:

-80+ Unique Characters waiting to be unlocked

-60 Chapter Long Story Mode

-13 Unique Maps/Battlegrounds

-Brand New Physics Engine
